p: It should be noted that this article is not meant to prescribe specific self-management strategies to patients, but rather provide education so patients may discuss options with their healthcare providers or make independent decisions that might be right for them. Healthcare providers may also direct their patients to the following article lay summary on ‘Medical and self-care advice for women with endometriosis during the COVID-19 pandemic’, which has been recently published by Endometriosis UK ( Supplementary Data S2).
